title: Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG Game Guide, Tips & Codes
description: Find Magic Chronicle Isekai RPG game guide and latest codes here!
author: Nivenka Stanton
excerpt: Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG Game Guide, Tips & Codes. This site covers the best in walkthroughs, tips, codes, news, and more!
text: Magic Chronicle: Isekai is an RPG (Role Playing Game) that will keep you entertained for quite some time! Battle your way through the levels and reach the top in no time! In today's article, we will guide you through certain aspects of gameplay, as well as help you out with some codes to give you a head start! Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED Magic Chronicle: Isekai Gameplay Magic Chronicle is easy enough to play, however, it can become more complicated as you progress. That is why we have compiled this guide! Battles are automatic in Magic Chronicle, meaning you don't have to worry about where to place your heroes in battle, or even swing a sword. Before you engage in battle, you will need to select the heroes that are the best suited to obtain victory. (Read more about the heroes in the section below). The only thing that you will concern yourself with during battle is playing that card skill at the right moment. Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED You can choose to keep the battle on autoplay, which will allow your heroes to use their special skills automatically. To do so, simply select the Auto icon displayed at the bottom far right-hand side of your screen during battle. Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED If you toggle the Auto icon to off, you will need to tap on the special skills yourself as they become available during the battle. This is recommended for the battles that are harder to win. Using your skills at exactly the right moment can mean the difference between victory and defeat. The same applies to the speed icon. The speed icon enables gameplay to happen at the selected speed multiplier level. Having gameplay speed set to 2x will speed up the battle process by 2x. Heroes in Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG In most RPG games you will have heroes or characters that you can use to progress in gameplay. In Magic Chronicle, your heroes fall under 3 different categories: Legacy Heroes – Also known as Legendary, SS, and S Tier in this game. These heroes are the best you can use in the game. The sooner you can obtain Legacy Heroes, the better for you to progress! Of all the heroes, your SS Tier is OP and in demand. No one likes to mess with an SS Hero! Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED Perfect Heroes – Also known as Epic and S Tier. These heroes are better than your common heroes. While they are not the best option, they are not the worst either. If you level and advance them correctly, they can still be a force to be reckoned with! Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED Normal Heroes – Also known as Common and B Tier Look, nobody likes to look down on heroes, but let's face it. These heroes are not the best to have at all. They can help you fairly well in the beginning, but leveling them up and advancing them is pretty useless unless you have countless resources to waste. Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED There are a few ways that you can obtain heroes throughout gameplay. This game uses a rerolling system that is common in most RPG games. In order to obtain the necessary currency for summoning heroes, you can do the following: Play battles and earn rewards Compete in events and place high in the ranks Complete milestones Grab Fortune Red Packets as they appear (These disappear really fast, so be sure to grab them as soon as possible!) Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED Purchase in the store using real-time currency, ie. real money Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED Additionally, there are three different ways to summon Heroes: Friendship Summon – Adding friends will grant you the currency needed to summon heroes. Available Race – Event summons can be used to summon very special heroes that would not be available during normal gameplay. Hero Summon – Used to summon Elite Heroes when you are lucky enough to obtain them. Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED Advancing Heroes Advancing Heroes ensures your heroes become stronger and more durable during battles. If you proceed to the Hero Fort, you can do just that! Simply select the Main City icon located on the left-hand side of your screen, select Hero Fort, and wait for the pop-up to appear. Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED You have two choices here; you can either advance each hero individually however you prefer them, or you can choose to advance them all automatically. The automatic option works perfectly if you are new to the game and not sure how it works in the beginning. Remember that advancing heroes requires you to have two or more of the same hero, otherwise it will not work. Leveling Up Heroes Leveling up heroes and advancing them are two different things. Advancing heroes will increase the rarity of your hero, whereas leveling up your hero will increase skills and stats. To level up your hero, simply follow the steps below: Select Hero on your screen displayed at the bottom of your screen. Select the hero you would like to level up. Select the Upgrade tab displayed at the bottom of your screen in the middle, and tap it. Your hero will upgrade as you continue tapping, and will stop if you run out of resources. Equipping Items To equip armor in Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG, follow the steps below: Select Hero on your screen displayed at the bottom of your screen. Select the hero you would like to equip with armor. There are two options available to equip armor: You can either utilize the Quick Wear option, which will automatically equip your hero with the gear you have obtained throughout gameplay, or, You can select each block individually and equip your hero with your preferred armor. How To Get Stronger in the Game There are a few ways that you can enhance your strength in Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG. A few of the ways can be found below: Enhance your heroes as often as you can Level up your heroes, as well as your gear Try to obtain higher-tier gear and heroes as early as you can, as this will help you progress faster Use your skills wisely during battles Participate in as many events as possible Complete as many milestones as you can Below we have listed a few tips that may help you during gameplay: Use heroes in a battle that has a higher tier, that way they will be stronger and you will stand a better chance at gaining a victory. Level up your heroes, doing so will increase their damage and make victory more likely in a battle. When summoning heroes, try to save up currency to roll 10 at a time, that way your chances are higher that you will obtain a higher-tier hero. Use lower-tier heroes to level up higher-tier ones. Claim free items to earn additional rewards daily. Use your diamonds and coins wisely, try to save as many as you can in the beginning, and use them only when necessary. Join a guild and participate in as many guild events as possible Additional Ways To Earn Rewards In This Game There are numerous ways to earn rewards in Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG. Codes – Codes can be redeemed to earn some amazing rewards (See The Section Below). Event Ambassador – Complete specified tasks and objectives to reach milestones and, in turn, obtain rewards from doing so. Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED Battles – Fight your way through enemies and pass levels to obtain rewards. Social Media – Join the social media platforms that enable you to earn rewards when you invite friends to join in on the fun, such as Facebook. Mail Inbox – Completing specific tasks and events will enable you to earn rewards, check your in-game mailbox for some spectacular surprises. Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED Daily Login – Log in to Magic Chronicle daily to earn additional rewards. Autoplay Income – Tapping on the kitty will give you rewards, just for being online! Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED 1000-Draw Major – Complete a whole main chapter to earn additional rewards. Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED These are some of the ways to earn additional rewards in Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG. You can be certain that as updates become available more ways to earn rewards will be revealed. Magic Chronicle: Isekai Codes Codes in any game are there to help gamers get a bit of a headstart in gameplay. They can give you a variety of social items, including armor, in-game currency, gold, and more. At the time of writing, Magic Chronicle does have the following codes for you to be able to redeem: Current Active Codes Below you will find the current active codes for Magic Chronicle: RED892 SUM513 WINTER21 KAIA777 JUICE787 PPL564 WIND260 MOON606 KEY838 MUSIC12 PLAY467 YOGA104 TEAM768 BINGO256 LUNA189 MAGICGO 288 stargems, 2 Massive Autoplay Income (13 hours) and 2 Summon Cards GALE520 188 stargems and 3 Treatment Agent Choice Chests MCDC520 188 stargems and 1 Massive Stardust (13 hours) MCFB520 188 stargems and 1 Massive EXP (13 hours) GOOD DAY 3 Summon Cards and 1 Fine Four-Faction Choice Card SVIP777 88 stargems and 1 Huge Amount of EXP (9 hours) SVIP888 88 stargems and 1 Treatment Agent Choice Chest SVIP999 88 stargems and 1 Advanced Enhance Torrent SVIP2024 88 stargems and 1 Basic Awakening Divine Stone MAGIC999 88 stargems and 1 Huge Amount of Copper (9 hours) MAGIC888 2 Enlighten Potions and 200 Flashing Stardust MAGIC777 2 Basic Awaken Divine Stone and 200 Basic Enhance Torrent MAGIC2024 88 stargems and 1 Huge Amount of Stardust (9-hours) PRE777 60 stargems and 50 Basic Enhance Torrent PRE888 60 stargems and 30 Common Soulstones PRE999 stargems APKPURE862 188 stargems and 1 Massive EXP (13 hours) APKPURE753 188 stargems and 3 Treatment Agent Choice Chests APKPURE922 188 stargems and 3 Advanced Enhance Torrent APKPURE712 188 stargems and 3 Basic Awakening Divine Stones APKPURE2333 188 stargems and 2 Perfect Awaken Divine Stone APKPURE8537 188 stargems and 1 Legendary Awaken Divine Stone APKPURE1250 188 stargems and 1 Awaken Divine Stone Choice Chest APKPURE8500 188 stargems and 300 Basic Enhance Torrent APKPURE667 188 stargems and 1Massive Stardust (13 hours) APKPURE1 188 stargems and 1 Massive Copper (13 hours) Note: VIP status may earn you higher rewards when you redeem these codes. How To Redeem Codes in Magic Chronicle Redeeming codes is very easy in this game! Download Magic Chronicle from the Play Store Log in to Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG Sign in as a guest or bind your account Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED Complete the tutorial until you reach the main screen Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED Tap on your avatar displayed in the top left-hand corner of your screen Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED Select the Code tab displayed at the bottom of your screen Enter the codes found above one at a time Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED Tap on Confirm Once you have completed the above you will receive your rewards Photo: MAGIC NETWORK LIMITED For more codes for popular game codes and how to redeem them, be sure to check out this link: Game Codes. Expired Codes For Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG There are currently no known expired codes for the game at the time of writing this. Codes Not Working in Magic Chronicle There may be various factors that would cause codes to not work in any game. If you find yourself in this predicament, make sure you are entering the code correctly, as grammar and case-sensitive letters are a major factor. Another reason you may find that codes stop working would be that the code has already expired. Be sure to bookmark the page for the latest codes and grab them as soon as possible. Some codes have a time limit in which you are able to redeem them. Make sure you enter them promptly in order to avoid missing out on rewards. That's A Wrap! That's it for now on our guide to gameplay and codes for Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG. This is a fun-to-play Action RPG. In all honesty, for an RPG, acquiring those special heroes is easier than one may think, making gameplay easier than a lot of other RPG games out there. If you have any additional tips you feel we may have missed in this article, feel free to comment in the section below. Be sure to check out some of our other gameplay articles that may be of interest to you, such as Warcraft Rumble, and Honkai Star Rail.
html:
Magic Chronicle: Isekai is an RPG (Role Playing Game) that will keep you entertained for quite some time! Battle your way through the levels and reach the top in no time!

In today's article, we will guide you through certain aspects of gameplay, as well as help you out with some codes to give you a head start!

Magic Chronicle: Isekai Gameplay

Magic Chronicle is easy enough to play, however, it can become more complicated as you progress. That is why we have compiled this guide!

Battles are automatic in Magic Chronicle, meaning you don't have to worry about where to place your heroes in battle, or even swing a sword.

Before you engage in battle, you will need to select the heroes that are the best suited to obtain victory. (Read more about the heroes in the section below).

The only thing that you will concern yourself with during battle is playing that card skill at the right moment.

You can choose to keep the battle on autoplay, which will allow your heroes to use their special skills automatically. To do so, simply select the Auto icon displayed at the bottom far right-hand side of your screen during battle.

If you toggle the Auto icon to off, you will need to tap on the special skills yourself as they become available during the battle. This is recommended for the battles that are harder to win.

Using your skills at exactly the right moment can mean the difference between victory and defeat.

The same applies to the speed icon. The speed icon enables gameplay to happen at the selected speed multiplier level. Having gameplay speed set to 2x will speed up the battle process by 2x.

Heroes in Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG

In most RPG games you will have heroes or characters that you can use to progress in gameplay. In Magic Chronicle, your heroes fall under 3 different categories:

  • Legacy Heroes – Also known as Legendary, SS, and S Tier in this game.

These heroes are the best you can use in the game. The sooner you can obtain Legacy Heroes, the better for you to progress! Of all the heroes, your SS Tier is OP and in demand. No one likes to mess with an SS Hero!

  • Perfect Heroes – Also known as Epic and S Tier.

These heroes are better than your common heroes. While they are not the best option, they are not the worst either. If you level and advance them correctly, they can still be a force to be reckoned with!

  • Normal Heroes – Also known as Common and B Tier

Look, nobody likes to look down on heroes, but let's face it. These heroes are not the best to have at all. They can help you fairly well in the beginning, but leveling them up and advancing them is pretty useless unless you have countless resources to waste.

There are a few ways that you can obtain heroes throughout gameplay. This game uses a rerolling system that is common in most RPG games.

In order to obtain the necessary currency for summoning heroes, you can do the following:

  • Play battles and earn rewards
  • Compete in events and place high in the ranks
  • Complete milestones
  • Grab Fortune Red Packets as they appear (These disappear really fast, so be sure to grab them as soon as possible!)
  • Purchase in the store using real-time currency, ie. real money

Additionally, there are three different ways to summon Heroes:

  1. Friendship Summon – Adding friends will grant you the currency needed to summon heroes.
  2. Available Race – Event summons can be used to summon very special heroes that would not be available during normal gameplay.
  3. Hero Summon – Used to summon Elite Heroes when you are lucky enough to obtain them.

Advancing Heroes

Advancing Heroes ensures your heroes become stronger and more durable during battles.

If you proceed to the Hero Fort, you can do just that! Simply select the Main City icon located on the left-hand side of your screen, select Hero Fort, and wait for the pop-up to appear.

You have two choices here; you can either advance each hero individually however you prefer them, or you can choose to advance them all automatically.

The automatic option works perfectly if you are new to the game and not sure how it works in the beginning.

Remember that advancing heroes requires you to have two or more of the same hero, otherwise it will not work.

Leveling Up Heroes

Leveling up heroes and advancing them are two different things. Advancing heroes will increase the rarity of your hero, whereas leveling up your hero will increase skills and stats.

To level up your hero, simply follow the steps below:

  • Select Hero on your screen displayed at the bottom of your screen.
  • Select the hero you would like to level up.
  • Select the Upgrade tab displayed at the bottom of your screen in the middle, and tap it. Your hero will upgrade as you continue tapping, and will stop if you run out of resources.

Equipping Items

To equip armor in Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG, follow the steps below:

  • Select Hero on your screen displayed at the bottom of your screen.
  • Select the hero you would like to equip with armor.

There are two options available to equip armor:

  • You can either utilize the Quick Wear option, which will automatically equip your hero with the gear you have obtained throughout gameplay, or,
  • You can select each block individually and equip your hero with your preferred armor.

How To Get Stronger in the Game

There are a few ways that you can enhance your strength in Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG. A few of the ways can be found below:

  • Enhance your heroes as often as you can
  • Level up your heroes, as well as your gear
  • Try to obtain higher-tier gear and heroes as early as you can, as this will help you progress faster
  • Use your skills wisely during battles
  • Participate in as many events as possible
  • Complete as many milestones as you can

Below we have listed a few tips that may help you during gameplay:

  • Use heroes in a battle that has a higher tier, that way they will be stronger and you will stand a better chance at gaining a victory.
  • Level up your heroes, doing so will increase their damage and make victory more likely in a battle.
  • When summoning heroes, try to save up currency to roll 10 at a time, that way your chances are higher that you will obtain a higher-tier hero.
  • Use lower-tier heroes to level up higher-tier ones.
  • Claim free items to earn additional rewards daily.
  • Use your diamonds and coins wisely, try to save as many as you can in the beginning, and use them only when necessary.
  • Join a guild and participate in as many guild events as possible

Additional Ways To Earn Rewards In This Game

There are numerous ways to earn rewards in Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG.

  • Codes – Codes can be redeemed to earn some amazing rewards (See The Section Below).
  • Event Ambassador – Complete specified tasks and objectives to reach milestones and, in turn, obtain rewards from doing so.
  • Battles – Fight your way through enemies and pass levels to obtain rewards.
  • Social Media – Join the social media platforms that enable you to earn rewards when you invite friends to join in on the fun, such as Facebook.
  • Mail Inbox – Completing specific tasks and events will enable you to earn rewards, check your in-game mailbox for some spectacular surprises.
  • Daily Login – Log in to Magic Chronicle daily to earn additional rewards.
  • Autoplay Income – Tapping on the kitty will give you rewards, just for being online!
  • 1000-Draw Major – Complete a whole main chapter to earn additional rewards.

These are some of the ways to earn additional rewards in Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG. You can be certain that as updates become available more ways to earn rewards will be revealed.

Magic Chronicle: Isekai Codes

Codes in any game are there to help gamers get a bit of a headstart in gameplay.

They can give you a variety of social items, including armor, in-game currency, gold, and more. At the time of writing, Magic Chronicle does have the following codes for you to be able to redeem:

Note: VIP status may earn you higher rewards when you redeem these codes.

How To Redeem Codes in Magic Chronicle

Redeeming codes is very easy in this game!

  • Download Magic Chronicle from the Play Store
  • Log in to Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG
  • Sign in as a guest or bind your account
  • Complete the tutorial until you reach the main screen
  • Tap on your avatar displayed in the top left-hand corner of your screen
  • Select the Code tab displayed at the bottom of your screen
  • Enter the codes found above one at a time
  • Tap on Confirm
  • Once you have completed the above you will receive your rewards

For more codes for popular game codes and how to redeem them, be sure to check out this link: Game Codes.

Expired Codes For Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG

There are currently no known expired codes for the game at the time of writing this.

Codes Not Working in Magic Chronicle

There may be various factors that would cause codes to not work in any game.

If you find yourself in this predicament, make sure you are entering the code correctly, as grammar and case-sensitive letters are a major factor.

Another reason you may find that codes stop working would be that the code has already expired. Be sure to bookmark the page for the latest codes and grab them as soon as possible.

Some codes have a time limit in which you are able to redeem them. Make sure you enter them promptly in order to avoid missing out on rewards.

That's A Wrap!

That's it for now on our guide to gameplay and codes for Magic Chronicle: Isekai RPG. This is a fun-to-play Action RPG. In all honesty, for an RPG, acquiring those special heroes is easier than one may think, making gameplay easier than a lot of other RPG games out there.

If you have any additional tips you feel we may have missed in this article, feel free to comment in the section below.

Be sure to check out some of our other gameplay articles that may be of interest to you, such as Warcraft Rumble, and Honkai Star Rail.
